trans-unit.source: Represents a control for viewing flow content in a fixed viewing mode that shows content one page at a time.
trans-unit.target: 한 번에 한 페이지씩 콘텐츠를 표시 하는 고정된 표시 모드에서 유동 콘텐츠를 보기 위한 컨트롤을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: FlowDocumentPageViewer allows only one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> as a child element.
FlowDocumentPageViewer shows content in page-at-a-time viewing mode.
trans-unit.target: FlowDocumentPageViewer 콘텐츠 페이지 런타임 보기 모드를 표시 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A similar control, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>, shows content in continuous scrolling mode.
trans-unit.target: 이와 비슷한 컨트롤 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>, 콘텐츠 연속 스크롤 모드를 표시 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: Both FlowDocumentPageViewer and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer> are fixed to a particular viewing mode.
trans-unit.target: 두 FlowDocumentPageViewer 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>특정 보기 모드에 고정 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: On the other hand, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> includes features that enable the user to dynamically choose between various viewing modes (as provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode> enumeration), at the cost of being poorer performing than FlowDocumentPageViewer or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>.
trans-unit.target: 반면에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>을 동적으로 다양 한 보기 모드 중에서 선택할 수 있도록 하는 기능이 포함 되어 있습니다 (제공 된 대로 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode>열거형), 증가 FlowDocumentPageViewer 나 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer> 보다 성능이 떨어집니다 하더라도</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a FlowDocumentPageViewer control with its default [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].

![Screenshot: FlowDocumentPageViewer](~/add/media/flowdocpageviewer-main.png "Screenshot: FlowDocumentPageViewer") - **Content Area** - The content area displays the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ![스크린 샷: FlowDocumentPageViewer](~/add/media/flowdocpageviewer-main.png "스크린 샷: FlowDocumentPageViewer") - **콘텐츠 영역** -콘텐츠 영역의 내용을 표시는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>에 지정 된는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>

trans-unit.source: - **Toolbar** - The default toolbar is docked underneath the content area, and hosts controls for navigating pages, and changing the zoom level.
trans-unit.target: - **도구 모음** -기본 도구 모음 콘텐츠 영역 아래에 도킹 되 고 페이지 탐색 및 확대/축소 수준을 변경에 대 한 컨트롤을 호스트 합니다.

trans-unit.source: - **Page Navigation Controls** - The page navigation controls include a button to jump to the next page (the down arrow) or previous page (the up arrow), as well as indicators for the current page number and total number of pages.
trans-unit.target: - **페이지 탐색 컨트롤** -현재 페이지 번호와 총 페이지 수에 대 한 표시기 뿐만 아니라 다음 페이지 (아래쪽 화살표) 또는 이전 페이지 (위쪽 화살표)으로 이동 하는 단추를 포함 하는 페이지 탐색 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: - **Zoom Controls** - The zoom controls enable the user to increase or decrease the zoom level by clicking the plus or minus buttons, respectively.
trans-unit.target: - **확대/축소 컨트롤** -확대/축소 컨트롤을 사용 하면 사용자를 더하기를 클릭 하 여 또는 빼기 단추, 확대/축소 수준의 늘리거나 각각.

trans-unit.source: The zoom controls also include a slider for adjusting the zoom level.
trans-unit.target: 확대/축소 컨트롤은 확대/축소 수준을 조정 하기 위한 슬라이더도 포함 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.Zoom%2A>.

- **Search** - The user can use the Ctr+F keyboard shortcut or you can use <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Find%2A> to toggle a search textbox that is used to find strings within the content.
trans-unit.target: - **검색** -사용자 Ctr + F 바로 가기 키를 사용할 수 또는 사용할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Find%2A>콘텐츠 내에서 문자열을 찾기 위해 사용 되는 검색 텍스트 상자를 전환할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Find%2A>

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Find%2A> for more information.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"></xref> class.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom*> level can be decreased.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom*>수준을 내릴 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom*>

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.DecreaseZoom%2A> method decreases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A> level by the amount specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 호출 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.DecreaseZoom%2A>메서드 감소는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A>수준에서 지정 된 크기는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.DecreaseZoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is subject to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.MinZoom%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성의 값은 값이 적용 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.MinZoom%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.MinZoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom*> level can be decreased; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom*>수준 수 감소 없으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom*>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanDecreaseZoom*> dependency property.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanDecreaseZoom*> dependency property.

If you derive from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>, you need this key in order to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanDecreaseZoom%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 파생 하는 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>,이 키의 값을 설정 하려면 필요는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanDecreaseZoom%2A>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanDecreaseZoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%28System.Windows.DependencyPropertyKey%2CSystem.Object%29>, passing CanDecreaseZoomPropertyKey as the `key` parameter.
To be added.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom*> level can be increased.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom*>수준을 올릴 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom*>

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.IncreaseZoom%2A> method increases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A> level by the amount specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 호출 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.IncreaseZoom%2A>메서드 증가 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A>수준에서 지정 된 크기는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.IncreaseZoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is subject to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.MaxZoom%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성의 값은 값이 적용 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.MaxZoom%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.MaxZoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom*> level can be increased; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom*>수준 수 증가 없으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom*>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanIncreaseZoom*> dependency property.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanIncreaseZoom*> dependency property.

If you derive from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>, you need this key in order to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanIncreaseZoom%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 파생 하는 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>,이 키의 값을 설정 하려면 필요는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanIncreaseZoom%2A>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanIncreaseZoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%28System.Windows.DependencyPropertyKey%2CSystem.Object%29>, passing CanIncreaseZoomPropertyKey as the `key` parameter.
To be added.
Executes the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom*> routed command.

This method decreases the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A> level by the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 이 방법을 사용 하면 현재 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A>수준으로 지정 된 값으로는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: Default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] includes a button to decrease the zoom.
Calling this method has no effect if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanDecreaseZoom%2A> property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 호출 하는 아무 영향도 주지는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanDecreaseZoom%2A>속성에서 반환 `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanDecreaseZoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: Toggles the **Find** dialog.
By default, Ctrl+F provides a keyboard shortcut for toggling the **Find** dialog.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로는 Ctrl + F 바로 가기 키를 표시 하거나 숨기는 **찾을** 대화 상자.

trans-unit.source: The following figure shows the **Find** dialog on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> with default UI.

![Screenshot: Find Dialog of FlowDocumentPageViewer](~/add/media/flowdocpageviewer-find.png "Screenshot: Find Dialog of FlowDocumentPageViewer") The default **Find** dialog includes a field for entering search text, as well as buttons for **Find Next**, **Find Previous**, and **Options**.
trans-unit.target: ![스크린 샷: FlowDocumentPageViewer 대화 찾기](~/add/media/flowdocpageviewer-find.png "스크린 샷: FlowDocumentPageViewer의 찾기 대화 상자") 기본값 **찾을** 대화 상자에 검색 텍스트 입력 필드가으로 단추에 대 한 **다음 찾기**, **이전 찾기**, 및 **옵션**합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following **Find** options are provided by default: - Match whole word only - Match case - Match diacritic - Match kashida - Match alef hamza
trans-unit.target: 다음 **찾을** 옵션이 기본적으로 제공 됩니다.-단어 단위로-일치 항목이 대/소문자 일치-분음 부호 kashida 일치-일치 아랍어

trans-unit.source: Executes the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom*> routed command.

This method increases the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A> level by the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 현재 증가 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A>수준으로 지정 된 값으로는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: Default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] includes a button to increase the zoom.
Calling this method has no effect if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanIncreaseZoom%2A> property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 호출 하는 아무 영향도 주지는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanIncreaseZoom%2A>속성에서 반환 `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanIncreaseZoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"></xref> displays selected text when the control does not have focus.
trans-unit.target: 지정 하는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다. 여부 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"> </xref> 컨트롤에 포커스가 없으면 선택한 텍스트를 표시 합니다.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"></xref> displays selected text when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"></xref> does not have focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"> </xref> 선택한 텍스트를 표시 때는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"> </xref> 포커스가 없으면, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 등록 된 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 값에 영향을 줄 수 요소에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [종속성 속성 값 우선 순위](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.IsInactiveSelectionHighlightEnabled*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"></xref> has focus and selected text.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"> </xref> 에 포커스 및 선택 된 텍스트입니다.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"></xref> displays selected text when the text box does not have focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"> </xref> 텍스트 상자에 포커스가 없으면 선택한 텍스트를 표시 합니다. 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 등록 된 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 값에 영향을 줄 수 요소에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [종속성 속성 값 우선 순위](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.IsSelectionActive*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the maximum allowable <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom*> level for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 허용 되는 최대 가져오거나 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom*>에 대 한 수준에서 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom*>

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] includes a slider that can be used to adjust the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A> level.
trans-unit.target: 기본 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 포함 조정 하는 데 사용할 수 있는 슬라이더는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A>수준.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the upper-limit value for the slider.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성에 있는 슬라이더에 대 한 상한 값을 지정합니다.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: The maximum allowable zoom level for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"></xref>, interpreted as a percentage.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 허용 가능한 최대 확대/축소 수준을 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"> </xref>백분율로 해석 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is 200.0 (a maximum zoom of 200%).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.MaxZoom*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the minimum allowable <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom*> level for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 허용 가능한 최소 가져오거나 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom*>에 대 한 수준에서 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom*>

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] includes a slider that can be used to adjust the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A> level.
trans-unit.target: 기본 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 포함 조정 하는 데 사용할 수 있는 슬라이더는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A>수준.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the lower-limit value for the slider.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성에 있는 슬라이더에 대 한 한 값을 지정합니다.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: The minimum allowable zoom level for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"></xref>, interpreted as a percentage.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 허용 가능한 최소 확대/축소 수준을 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"> </xref>백분율로 해석 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is 80.0 (a minimum zoom of 80%).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.MinZoom*> dependency property.
To be added.
Builds the visual tree for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 시각적 트리를 생성 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called whenever <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> is called.
This method overrides <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnApplyTemplate%2A>.
Handles the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.CancelPrint*> routed command.
This method is called when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.CancelPrint%2A> command is called.
Called whenever an unhandled <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenuOpening"></xref> routed event reaches this class in its route.
trans-unit.target: 처리 되지 않은 때마다 호출 <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenuOpening"> </xref> 라우트된 이벤트가 해당 경로에서이 클래스에 도달 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: 이 이벤트를 처리 하는 클래스를 추가 하려면이 메서드를 구현 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Arguments of the event.

Provides an appropriate <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> implementation for this control, as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] automation infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 적절 한 제공 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> 의 일부로이 컨트롤에 대 한 구현을 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 자동화 인프라입니다.

trans-unit.source: The appropriate <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> implementation for this control.
trans-unit.target: 적절 한 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> 이 컨트롤에 대 한 구현 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Handles the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom*> routed command.
This method is called when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom%2A> command is called.
Called when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document*> property is changed.
This method overrides <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.OnDocumentChanged%2A>.
Handles the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Find*> routed command.
This method is called when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Find%2A> command is called.
Handles the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.FirstPage*> routed command.
This method is called when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.FirstPage%2A> command is called.
This method overrides <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.OnFirstPageCommand%2A>.
Handles the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.GoToPage*> routed command.
This method is called when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.GoToPage%2A> command is called.
This method overrides <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.OnGoToPageCommand%2A>.
The page number to go to.
Handles the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom*> routed command.
This method is called when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom%2A> command is called.
Handles the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref> routed event.
This method overrides <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnKeyDown%2A>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs"></xref> object that contains the arguments associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs"> </xref> 개체와 연결 된 인수를 포함 하는 <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"> </xref> 라우트된 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: Handles the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.LastPage*> routed command.
This method is called when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.LastPage%2A> command is called.
This method overrides <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.OnLastPageCommand%2A>.
Handles the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseWheel"></xref> routed event.
This method is called whenever the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseWheel> routed event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 호출 될 때마다는 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseWheel>라우트된 이벤트가 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseWheel>

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnMouseWheel%2A>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseWheelEventArgs"></xref> object containing arguments associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseWheel"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseWheelEventArgs"> </xref> 개체와 연결 된 인수를 포함 하는 <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseWheel"> </xref> 라우트된 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: Handles the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.NextPage*> routed command.
This method is called when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.NextPage%2A> command is called.
This method overrides <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.OnNextPageCommand%2A>.
Handles the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViewsChanged"></xref> routed event.
This method is called whenever the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViewsChanged> routed event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 호출 될 때마다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViewsChanged>라우트된 이벤트가 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViewsChanged>

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.OnPageViewsChanged%2A>.
Handles the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.PreviousPage*> routed command.
This method is called when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.PreviousPage%2A> command is called.
This method overrides <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.OnPreviousPageCommand%2A>.
Handles the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Print*> routed command.
This method is called when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Print%2A> command is called.
Called when a printing job has completed.
trans-unit.target: 인쇄 작업이 완료 될 때 호출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the selected content of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"></xref>.
Selection is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: 선택 영역은.NET Framework 버전 3.5에서에서 도입 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The selected content of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"></xref>.
Gets or sets the brush that highlights the selected text.
trans-unit.target: 선택한 텍스트를 강조 표시 하는 브러시를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can specify the brush that highlights selected text in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> by setting the SelectionBrush and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionOpacity%2A> properties..
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>SelectionBrush 및는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionOpacity%2A>속성...</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionOpacity%2A> 설정 하 여</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> 선택한 텍스트를 강조 표시 하는 브러시를 지정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: A brush that highlights the selected text.
trans-unit.target: 선택한 텍스트를 강조 표시 하는 브러시입니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the opacity of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush*>.
If you set the SelectionOpacity to 0, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush%2A> is transparent and is not visible.
trans-unit.target: SelectionOpacity 0으로 설정 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush%2A>투명 하 고 표시 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the SelectionOpacity to 1.0 or greater, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush%2A> is opaque and the selected text is not visible.
trans-unit.target: SelectionOpacity 1.0 이상으로 설정 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush%2A>불투명 하 게 선택 하 고는 표시 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush%2A>

trans-unit.source: The opacity of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush*>.
The default is 0.4.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionOpacity*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the current zoom level for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"></xref>.
The zoom level is constrained by the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.MinZoom%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.MaxZoom%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 확대/축소 수준을의 값에 의해 제한 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.MinZoom%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.MaxZoom%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.MaxZoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.MinZoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: The current zoom level, interpreted as a percentage.
trans-unit.target: 현재 확대/축소 수준을 백분율로 해석 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is 100.0 (a zoom level of 100%).
Gets or sets the zoom increment.

The zoom increment is the percentage by which the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A> level is increased or decreased when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom%2A> commands are executed, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 확대/축소 증가값은 백분율입니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A>수준 증가 하거나 감소 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom%2A>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom%2A>각각 명령이 실행 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: The current zoom increment, interpreted as a percentage.
trans-unit.target: 현재 확대/축소 증분 백분율로 해석 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is 10.0 (zoom increments by 10%).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement*> dependency property.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom*> dependency property.
To be added.
